statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, fuel_level FROM vehicle_performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE vehicle_id = 123
SELECT engine_rpm, engine_temperature FROM vehicle_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE speed > 60 AND engine_rpm < 3000 LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE vehicle_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE engine_temperature > 80 AND fuel_level < 50;
SELECT timestamp, engine_rpm FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY engine_rpm DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE fuel_level < 20;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_rpm FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE engine_temperature < 70 AND speed < 80 ORDER BY engine_rpm ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_metrics;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature FROM vehicle_metrics WHERE engine_temperature > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, oil_pressure FROM vehicle_metrics WHERE oil_pressure < 30;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level FROM vehicle_metrics ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_metrics WHERE engine_temperature > 80 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature, oil_pressure FROM vehicle_metrics WHERE fuel_level < 50;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_metrics LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicle_metrics.vehicle_id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id;
SELECT AVG(engine_temperature), MAX(oil_pressure), MIN(fuel_level) FROM vehicle_metrics;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_metrics WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature FROM vehicle_metrics ORDER BY engine_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, error_message FROM error_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(fuel_level) FROM vehicle_metrics GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, engine_temperature, fuel_level FROM vehicle_metrics WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE vehicle_id = 10 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, vehicle_id, timestamp, error_message FROM error_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 5 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT SUM(engine_temperature) AS total_engine_temperature, AVG(fuel_level) AS average_fuel_level FROM vehicle_metrics;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(maintenance_id) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_history GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING total_maintenance > 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE make='Toyota';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_needs WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015
SELECT * FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE efficiency_percentage > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2010
SELECT SUM(fuel_consumption) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM performance_metrics WHERE vehicle_id = 101
SELECT make, model, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Ford' AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2015 ORDER BY mileage DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, acceleration FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, metric_timestamp, fuel_consumption FROM vehicle_performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT vehicle_id, efficiency_score, efficiency_date FROM operational_efficiency WHERE efficiency_score > 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, acceleration FROM vehicle_performance_metrics ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, efficiency_score, efficiency_date FROM operational_efficiency WHERE efficiency_score > 90 ORDER BY efficiency_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, health_status, last_checkup_date FROM vehicle_health_status WHERE health_status = 'Good' ORDER BY last_checkup_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, priority_level FROM maintenance_needs WHERE priority_level > 2 ORDER BY priority_level ASC, vehicle_id DESC;
